title: Add deduplication + canonical ID mapping for scheduled Salesforce/HubSpot sync

sections.text: Implement dedupe logic on top of the scheduled read-only refresh (GOLD-80) to prevent duplicate accounts/contacts/opportunities from being created/updated across runs. Introduce a canonical record mapping keyed by CRM record ID + workspace, with merge/conflict rules for in-scope fields and safe handling of deletes/ID changes. Ensure dedupe outcomes are logged/metriced per run so Sales_Accelerator uses a single stable internal entity for forecasting and next-best-action.
